Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points off the bench for the Memphis Grizzlies.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander had a 35-point, seven-assist performance for the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Oklahoma City Thunder extended their win streak to 11 games.
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura reflected on a tumultuous year of basketball, expressing both pride and frustration.
Kawamura hopes 2025 will be a year of further growth.
